title: Ep. 88: 'The Andy Greenwald Podcast' With Gale Anne Hurd
description:
Andy Greenwald talks with superproducer Gale Anne Hurd about her new series, ‘Falling Water,’ cocreating ‘The Terminator,’ steering ‘The Walking Dead,’ and more.
      
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
